text:
(Site area and Authoring area)

menu Find: I would prefer to have "New <doctype> Document" commands NOT being
separated by lines among each other. It would be more clear if this menu
consisted of only three groups of commands:
- "New <doctype> Document" commands
- Language version commands
- Administrative commands (change pw, logout)
creator: michael.trindler@id.unizh.ch
andreas@apache.org
text:
The reason for this is that the items are added by different modules, which add
whole blocks instead of single items. Maybe we can make this more flexible.
